name: Avoid method invocation in loop termination expression (PHP)
description:
This rule searches for all artifacts containing function calls in loop test expressions. 
Note: foreach loop is not considered for this QR.
output:
This report lists all artifact containing function calls in loop test expressions.

This QR provides the following information:
artifact full name.
rationale: When calling a function in a test expression of loop, the function will be computed in each loop iteration and will reduce performance dramatically.
remediation: Reduce the number of artifacts containing function calls in loop test expressions.
remediationSample:
<?php

function getMaxValue() { return 2; }

$maxValue = getMaxValue();

for ($i=0; $i < $maxValue; $i++) { //Violation removed
  echo "for: ", $i, PHP_EOL;
}

$i = 0;
while($i < $maxValue) { //Violation removed
  echo "while: ", $i++, PHP_EOL;
}

$i = 0;
do {
  echo "do-while: ", $i++, PHP_EOL;
} while($i < $maxValue); //Violation removed
?>
